Locale.Value:
OCR PDF Editing Now Available
With a more intuitive and flexible editing experience, you can perform real-time edits on text that has undergone OCR processing, utilizing our newly integrated editing tools to easily add, delete, or modify text.
Improved E-Signature Experience
- Now you can effortlessly remove signatures from the quick signature area.
- Now you can extract handwriting as signatures from uploaded images for a seamless signing process.
